column3: (…) In addition to the novamin mineral, which plugs the holes on the root surface, there is also sodium fluoride in the improved formula (…) of the improved Sensodyne (…) onarım ve koruma toothpaste, so that a (…) much harder and permanent (…) layer is obtained.  This layer can eliminate the dentine sensitivity by plugging the exposed pores of the tooth.
